name: Bamba's Snack Quest
storyline: The squirrel stole the kids favorite peanut snack, the boy decided to chase squirrels! He came to street, this is a great adventure! We would help the boy find clues, solve puzzle and obstacles, continue to advance, until found his peanut snack!
